meanings.sent1: The couple fornicates in their bedroom.
meanings.sent2: It is natural for animals to fornicate for reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The birds outside seem to fornicate loudly every morning.
meanings.sent4: The engine of the car and the road fornicate to move forward.
meanings.sent5: The flowers and bees fornicate to create new life.

meanings.sent1: The man fornicates with someone other than his spouse.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, it is forbidden to fornicate outside of marriage.
meanings.sent3: The character in the novel always finds a way to fornicate behind their partner's back.
meanings.sent4: Betrayal and deceit fornicate in the shadows of infidelity.
meanings.sent5: The forbidden fruit of temptation fornicates with the weak will of the heart.

meanings.sent1: She fornicates with a coworker while still married.
meanings.sent2: It is heartbreaking when a partner forsakes trust and fornicates with another.
meanings.sent3: The gossip in the town always involves who fornicates with whom.
meanings.sent4: Secrets and lies fornicate in the dark corners of forbidden relationships.
meanings.sent5: The web of deceit and desire fornicate in the tangled affairs of the heart.
